description: An anime-exclusive combination attack where Franky, Usopp, and Chopper combine together in a mecha-like formation. With Sanji's help propelling them, they attack with a stomping technique. This is a reduced version of Pirates Docking 6, created when Robin, Zoro, and Sanji refuse to participate in the full formation.
requirements: Requires Franky, Usopp, and Chopper to physically combine
strengths: Allows for coordinated attacks from multiple crew members
Provides comedic relief during intense battles
weaknesses: Largely ineffective against powerful opponents like Oars
Requires cooperation from specific crew members
Physical stomping attack has limited range and power

reveals.information: Pirates Docking 3 is an anime-exclusive variant created when the full six-member formation cannot be achieved

description: The power of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi allows Kuma to repel anything he touches with his paw pads. In this episode, he demonstrates this ability by instantly making Perona vanish with a single touch, sending her to a distant location.
requirements: Physical contact with the paw pads
strengths: Can repel any physical object or living being
Can send targets to extremely distant locations
Works on both tangible and intangible concepts

reveals.information: First demonstration of Kuma's repelling ability at Thriller Bark

description: Zoro uses Shusui, the legendary black blade he acquired after defeating Ryuma, in combat for the first time against Oars. Shusui is one of the 21 Great Grade swords and becomes one of Zoro's primary weapons.
strengths: Shusui is exceptionally durable and sharp
As a black blade, it cannot be damaged
The sword is heavier than normal, increasing cutting power
weaknesses: Requires significant strength to wield effectively due to its weight

reveals.information: First combat use of Shusui by Zoro in battle
